about_the_game:
This is a musical action game with multiple gameplay attempts
Introduction
In the game, you play as the "original", dodging blocks in different levels, surviving for a certain amount of time or achieving certain conditions to achieve victory
The current levels in the game have different operating skills, including "time dilation", "time stop", "time travel" and so on
In different levels, the above abilities will also change.

The game has multiple levels to play, each of which contains different random elements
Fall Level - You need to avoid enemies generated according to the music frequency and survive for a specified time until you win
Shuttle Level - You need to travel through a time tunnel, according to the rhythm of the music to use the ability to travel through time, reach the end to win
Vampire Survivor Level - Vampire-like survivor's meat pigeon level, you need to ensure your survival while fending off the constant arrival of monsters. There are three development routes to choose from, develop your survival strategy, and survive long enough.

Art style
The game uses a unified - Cyberneon, steam wave style
It is called "light pollution", which also means that if you have a series of complications such as "photosensitive epilepsy", discomfort and play this game

Special mechanism
Time dilation - When you use this skill in a certain level, it will slow down the time flow of all objects except your main character. It can help you create time to think about countermeasures, and using this ability will also slow down the time count.
Time Stop - This ability is similar to DIO's ability in JOJO, as the name suggests, it is quite powerful, but you are also affected by the time stop, which pauses the time count.
Time Switch - This ability allows you to travel through different dimensions of time and space while exposing yourself to different challenges. Properly used, this ability can greatly reduce the difficulty of playing a level

name: 环形杀手 Circle Killer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows7/8/10
  • Processor: any type
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: any type
  • DirectX: Version 6.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any type

short_description: play the role of "circle" to avoid incoming blocks with rhythmic music now have two different levels Fall Level: Accompanied by dynamic music you will move freely around the area, avoiding falling blocks Traversal Level: You will continue traversing a section of road with rhythmic music
